headings: Fiware Orion gateway DFL,Option 1: Global Custom JSON Format (Applies to All Measurements)
content: 2. Define a global JSON format using the custom entity JSON configuration input. 4. Set its value as a valid Qute template expression that outputs a valid Orion Fiware JSON. 6. Use the following variables in the template: - {category} - {timestamp} - {timestampSecondsPrecision} - {hardwareId} - {measurementName} - {measurementValue} This approach ensures that all measurements from all esthesis agents follow the same JSON structure.
pageTitle: Option 1: Global Custom JSON Format (Applies to All Measurements)
